message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $12,000. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
Alice,  $12,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for the product.  Let me know if you're open to that.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $9,000 is too low for me.  How about we split the difference and settle at $10,500?
Alice, I'm still interested in the product, but I can't go higher than $9,500.  This is my final offer. Let me know if you're willing to accept.
